00048 /*****************************************************************************\
00049  *
00050  *  File:  m_opti.c
00051  *
00052  *  Description:
00053  *      Performs machine level code optimization:
00054  *      1) common subexpression elimination
00055  *      2) limited copy propogation (only R-R, R-M, M-R, M-M)
00056  *      3) dead code removal (unused operations, src1=dest)
00057  *
00058  *      This code is base-lined off the work developed by Scott Mahlke in
00059  *      l_basic_opti.c
00060  *
00061  *  Creation Date :  July 1991
00062  *
00063  *  Author:  Roger A. Bringmann
00064  *
00065  *  Revisions:
00066  *      Roger A. Bringmann, February 1993
00067  *      Modified to support new Lcode format.  Reduces memory requirements
00068  *      for a code generator.  Also, adds a more friendly interface for
00069  *      code generation.
00070  *
00071  *      (C) Copyright 1991, Roger A. Bringmann
00072  *      All rights granted to University of Illinois Board of Regents.
00073  *
00074 \*****************************************************************************/
00075 /* 09/17/02 REK Updating to use functions from libtahoeop instead of Tmdes. */
00076 
00077 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */

00080 #include <Lcode/l_disjvreg.h>

00148 void
00149 L_read_parm_mopti (Parm_Parse_Info * ppi)
00150 {
00151   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "print_stats", &Mopti_print_stats);
00152 
00153   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_opti", &Mopti_do_local_opti);
00154 
00155   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_common_subs", &Mopti_do_local_common_subs);
00156   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_const_prop", &Mopti_do_local_const_prop);
00157   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_const_fold", &Mopti_do_local_const_fold);
00158   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_copy_prop", &Mopti_do_local_copy_prop);
00159   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_rev_copy_prop",
00160                  &Mopti_do_local_rev_copy_prop);
00161   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_local_add_regrouping",
00162                  &Mopti_do_local_add_regrouping);
00163   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_dead_code", &Mopti_do_dead_code);
00164 
00165   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_global_opti", &Mopti_do_local_opti);
00166 
00167   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_global_common_subs", &Mopti_do_global_common_subs);
00168   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_global_copy_prop", &Mopti_do_global_copy_prop);
00169 
00170   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "do_coalescing", &Mopti_do_coalescing);
00171 
00172   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "compare_height_reduction",
00173                  &Mopti_do_compare_height_reduction);
00174   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "constant_preloading", &Mopti_constant_preloading);
00175   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "shift_add_merge", &Mopti_shift_add_merge);
00176   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "epilogue_merge", &Mopti_do_epilogue_merge);
00177   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "mopti2_redundant_memory_ops",
00178                  &Mopti2_redundant_memory_ops);
00179   L_read_parm_b (ppi, "?debug_messages_mopti", &Mopti_debug_messages);
00180 }

00183 static void
00184 Mopti_init ()
00185 {
00186   /* This prevents the code from performing initialization again */
00187   Mopti_init_performed = 1;
00188   MOD ("Mopti initializing");
00189   L_alloc_danger_ext = L_create_alloc_pool ("L_Danger_Ext",
00190                                             sizeof (struct L_Danger_Ext), 64);
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 static void
00195 Mopti_deinit ()
00196 {
00197   Mopti_init_performed = 0;
00198   MOD ("Mopti deinitializing");
00199   L_free_alloc_pool (L_alloc_danger_ext);
00200   L_alloc_danger_ext = NULL;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void
00204 Mopti_perform_optimizations_tahoe (L_Func * fn)
00205 {
00206   int j, k, change;
00207   int common_subs, copy_prop, rev_copy_prop, dead_code;
00208   int add_regrouping;
00209   int c1 = 0, c2 = 0, c4 = 0, c5 = 0;
00210   L_Cb *cb;
00211 
00212   if (!Mopti_init_performed)
00213     Mopti_init ();
00214 
00215   MOD ("START Mopti_perform_optimizations_tahoe()");
00216 
00217   if (Mopti_do_coalescing)
00218     {
00219       MOD ("Disjoint VREG renaming + coalescing");
00220       L_rename_coalesce_disjoint_virtual_registers (fn, NULL);
00221     }
00222 
00223   if (Mopti_do_compare_height_reduction)
00224     {
00225       MOD ("DOM analysis");
00226       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, DOMINATOR);
00227       L_loop_detection (fn, 0);
00228       MOD ("Mopti loop compare height reduction");
00229       Mopti_loop_compare_height_reduction (fn);
00230     }
00231 
00232   k = 0;
00233   common_subs = copy_prop = rev_copy_prop = dead_code = 0;
00234   add_regrouping = 0;
00235 
00236   do
00237     {
00238       change = 0;
00239 
00240       MOD ("Optimization iteration %d", k);
00241 
00242       MOD ("Partial dead code removal");
00243 
00244       dead_code += L_partial_dead_code_removal (fn);
00245 
00246       MOD ("Flow analysis: LV");
00247 
00248       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | SUPPRESS_PG);
00249 
00250       if (Mopti_do_local_opti)
00251         {
00252           MOD ("Local optimizations");
00253 
00254           for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
00255             {
00256               if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
00257                   L_find_attr (cb->attr, "kernel"))
00258                 continue;
00259 
00260               j = 0;
00261               do
00262                 {
00263                   if (Mopti_do_local_common_subs)
00264                     {
00265                       /* Handle common sub-expression elimination */
00266                       c1 = L_local_common_subexpression (cb,
00267                                    L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_INT_CONSTANT |
00268                                    L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_FLT_CONSTANT |
00269 #if 0
00270                                    L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_LABEL_CONSTANT |
00271 #endif
00272                                    L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_STRING_CONSTANT);
00273                       common_subs += c1;
00274                       change += c1;
00275                     }
00276 
00277                   if (Mopti_do_local_const_prop)
00278                     {
00279                       M_local_constant_propagation (cb);
00280                     }
00281 
00282                   if (Mopti_do_local_add_regrouping)
00283                     {
00284                       c4 = M_local_add_regrouping (cb);
00285                       add_regrouping += c4;
00286                       change += c4;
00287                     }
00288 
00289                   if (Mopti_do_local_rev_copy_prop)
00290                     {
00291                       c5 = M_local_rev_copy_propagation (cb, 1);
00292                       rev_copy_prop += c5;
00293                     }
00294 
00295                   if (Mopti_do_local_copy_prop)
00296                     {
00297                       c2 = M_local_copy_propagation (cb, 1);
00298                       copy_prop += c2;
00299                       change += c2;
00300                     }
00301 
00302                   if (Mopti_do_compare_height_reduction)
00303                     {
00304                       Mopti_compare_height_reduction (fn, cb, NULL, 0, NULL);
00305                     }
00306                   j++;
00307                 }
00308               while ((c1 + c2 + c4 != 0) && (j < Mopti_imax_num_iterations));
00309             }
00310         }
00311 
00312       if (Mopti_do_global_opti)
00313         {
00314           MOD ("Flow analysis: LV DOM AD AE");
00315 
00316           L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB |
00317                               AVAILABLE_DEFINITION | AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION);
00318 
00319           MOD ("Global optimizations");
00320 
00321           L_compute_danger_info (fn);
00322           M_global_code_optimization (fn);
00323           L_delete_all_danger_ext (fn);
00324         }
00325 
00326       k++;                      /* iteration counter */
00327     }
00328   while (change && (k < Mopti_omax_num_iterations));
00329 
00330   if (Mopti_print_stats)
00331     {
00332       fprintf (stderr, "Local Optimizations:\n");
00333       fprintf (stderr, "   Common subexpressions  : %d\n", common_subs);
00334       fprintf (stderr, "   Copy propagations      : %d\n", copy_prop);
00335       fprintf (stderr, "   Add regrouping         : %d\n", add_regrouping);
00336       fprintf (stderr, "   Rev Copy propagations  : %d\n", rev_copy_prop);
00337       fprintf (stderr, "   Dead code removed      : %d\n", dead_code);
00338       fprintf (stderr, "  --------------------------------------\n");
00339     }
00340 
00341   MOD ("Dead block removal");
00342 
00343   L_delete_unreachable_blocks (fn);
00344 
00345   if (Mopti_do_global_opti)
00346     {
00347       MOD ("Flow analysis: LV DOM AD AE");
00348 
00349       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB |
00350                           AVAILABLE_DEFINITION | AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION);
00351 
00352       MOD ("Global optimizations");
00353 
00354       L_compute_danger_info (fn);
00355       M_global_code_optimization (fn);
00356       L_delete_all_danger_ext (fn);
00357 
00358       MOD ("Flow analysis: LV RD");
00359 
00360       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | REACHING_DEFINITION);
00361 
00362       MOD ("Global sxt elim");
00363 
00364       Mopti_global_sxt_elimination (fn);
00365     }
00366 
00367   if (Mopti_do_local_opti)
00368     {
00369       MOD ("Flow analysis: LV");
00370 
00371       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE);
00372 
00373       MOD ("Local optimization");
00374 
00375       for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = cb->next_cb)
00376         {
00377           if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
00378               L_find_attr (cb->attr, "kernel"))
00379             continue;
00380 
00381           if (Mopti_do_local_copy_prop)
00382             M_local_copy_propagation (cb, 0);
00383           L_local_dead_code_removal (cb);
00384           M_local_redmov_removal (cb);
00385         }
00386     }
00387 
00388   Mopti_deinit ();
00389 
00390   MOD ("END Mopti_perform_optimizations_tahoe");
00391 }
00392 
00393 
00394 void
00395 Mopti_phase2_optimizations (L_Func * fn)
00396 {
00397   int cb_iterations, func_iterations, change;
00398   int common_subs, copy_prop, rev_copy_prop, dead_code;
00399   L_Cb *cb;
00400 
00401   if (!Mopti_init_performed)
00402     Mopti_init ();
00403 
00404   MOD ("START Mopti_phase2_optimizations()");
00405 
00406   func_iterations = 0;
00407   common_subs = copy_prop = rev_copy_prop = dead_code = 0;
00408 
00409   do
00410     {
00411       change = 0;
00412 
00413       MOD ("Optimization iteration %d", func_iterations);
00414 
00415       if (Mopti_do_global_opti)
00416         {
00417           MOD ("Flow analysis LV DOM AD AE");
00418 
00419           L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | DOMINATOR_CB |
00420                               AVAILABLE_DEFINITION | AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION);
00421 
00422           L_compute_danger_info (fn);
00423 
00424           MOD ("Global code optimization");
00425 
00426           M_global_code_optimization (fn);
00427 
00428           L_delete_all_danger_ext (fn);
00429         }
00430 
00431       MOD ("Partial dead code removal");
00432 
00433       dead_code += L_partial_dead_code_removal (fn);
00434 
00435       MOD ("Flow analysis LV");
00436 
00437       L_do_flow_analysis (fn, LIVE_VARIABLE | SUPPRESS_PG);
00438 
00439       MOD ("Local optimizations");
00440 
00441       for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = cb->next_cb)
00442         {
00443           int c1 = 0, c2, c3 = 0, c4;
00444 
00445           if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
00446               L_find_attr (cb->attr, "kernel"))
00447             continue;
00448 
00449           cb_iterations = 0;
00450 
00451           do
00452             {
00453               if (Mopti_do_local_common_subs)
00454                 {
00455                   c1 = L_local_common_subexpression (cb,
00456                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_INT_CONSTANT
00457                                                      |
00458                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_FLT_CONSTANT
00459                                                      |
00460                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_LABEL_CONSTANT
00461                                                      |
00462                                                      L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_STRING_CONSTANT);
00463                   common_subs += c1;
00464                   change += c1;
00465                 }
00466 
00467               if (Mopti_do_local_rev_copy_prop)
00468                 {
00469                   c2 = M_local_rev_copy_propagation (cb, 1);
00470                   rev_copy_prop += c2;
00471                 }
00472 
00473               if (Mopti_do_local_copy_prop)
00474                 {
00475                   c3 = M_local_copy_propagation (cb, 1);
00476                   copy_prop += c3;
00477                   change += c3;
00478                 }
00479 
00480               if (1)
00481                 {
00482                   c4 = M_local_redmov_removal (cb);
00483                   change += c4;
00484                 }
00485 
00486               cb_iterations++;  /* iteration counter */
00487             }
00488           while ((c1 || c3) && (cb_iterations < Mopti_imax_num_iterations));
00489 
00490           if (Mopti_do_local_const_fold)
00491             change += M_local_constant_folding (cb);
00492           if (Mopti_do_local_const_prop)
00493             change += M_local_constant_propagation (cb);
00494         }
00495       func_iterations++;        /* iteration counter */
00496     }
00497   while (change && (func_iterations < Mopti_omax_num_iterations));
00498 
00499   MOD ("Partial dead code removal");
00500 
00501   dead_code += L_partial_dead_code_removal (fn);
00502 
00503   if (Mopti_debug_messages || Mopti_print_stats)
00504     {
00505       fprintf (stderr, "Mopti_phase2_optimizations(%s)\n", fn->name);
00506       fprintf (stderr, "---------------------------------------\n");
00507       fprintf (stderr, " LOCAL\n");
00508       fprintf (stderr, "   Common subexpressions    : %6d\n", common_subs);
00509       fprintf (stderr, "   Copy propagations        : %6d\n", copy_prop);
00510       fprintf (stderr, "   Rev copy propagations    : %6d\n", rev_copy_prop);
00511       fprintf (stderr, "   Dead code removed        : %6d\n", dead_code);
00512       fprintf (stderr, "---------------------------------------\n");
00513     }
00514 
00515   Mopti_deinit ();
00516   MOD ("END Mopti_phase2_optimizations()");
00517   return;
00518 }
00519 
00520 
00521 static int
00522 M_global_code_optimization (L_Func * fn)
00523 {
00524   L_Cb *cb1, *cb2;
00525   int c1, c2, global_common_subs, global_copy_prop;
00526 
00527   global_copy_prop = global_common_subs = 0;
00528 
00529   for (cb1 = fn->first_cb; cb1 != NULL; cb1 = cb1->next_cb)
00530     {
00531       if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb1->flags, L_CB_BOUNDARY))
00532         continue;
00533 
00534       if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb1->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
00535           L_find_attr (cb1->attr, "kernel"))
00536         continue;
00537 
00538       for (cb2 = fn->first_cb; cb2 != NULL; cb2 = cb2->next_cb)
00539         {
00540           if (cb1 == cb2)
00541             continue;
00542 
00543           if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb2->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
00544               L_find_attr (cb2->attr, "kernel"))
00545             continue;
00546 
00547           if (!L_in_cb_DOM_set (cb2, cb1->id))
00548             continue;
00549 
00550           if (Mopti_do_global_common_subs)
00551             {
00552               c1 = M_global_common_subexpression (cb1, cb2,
00553                                                   L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_LABEL_CONSTANT
00554                                                   |
00555                                                   L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_INT_CONSTANT
00556                                                   |
00557                                                   L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_FLT_CONSTANT);
00558               global_common_subs += c1;
00559             }
00560 
00561           if (Mopti_do_global_copy_prop)
00562             {
00563               c2 = M_global_copy_propagation (cb1, cb2);
00564               global_copy_prop += c2;
00565             }
00566         }
00567     }
00568 
00569   if (Mopti_print_stats)
00570     {
00571       fprintf (stderr, "Global Optimizations:\n");
00572       fprintf (stderr, "   Common subexpressions: %d\n", global_common_subs);
00573       fprintf (stderr, "   Copy propagations    : %d\n", global_copy_prop);
00574       fprintf (stderr, "  --------------------------------------\n");
00575     }
00576   return 0;
00577 }
00578 
00579 
00580 static int
00581 M_local_add_regrouping (L_Cb * cb)
00582 {
00583   int i, index, change, macro_flagA, macro_flagC;
00584   int match0, match1, match2, made_change;
00585   int OK, a_b_changed;
00586   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *opC, *opD;
00587   L_Oper *temp_oper1, *temp_oper2;
00588 
00589   Set changed_opers = NULL;
00590 
00591   /* Looking for pairs of opers of the form
00592 
00593      add  x1 = a,z1
00594      add  y1 = x1,b
00595 
00596      add  x2 = a,z2
00597      add  y2 = x2,b
00598 
00599      replace with 
00600 
00601      add  x1 = a,b
00602      add  y1 = x1,z1
00603 
00604      add  x2 = a,b
00605      add  y2 = x2,z2
00606 
00607      so that local_common_sub can remove an instruction */
00608 
00609 
00610   change = 0;
00611   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
00612     {
00613       if (!L_add_opcode (opA))
00614         continue;
00615 
00616       if (Set_in (changed_opers, opA->id))
00617         continue;
00618 
00619       if (!(L_is_register (opA->src[0]) && L_is_register (opA->src[1])))
00620         continue;
00621 
00622       if (L_has_unsafe_macro_dest_operand (opA))
00623         continue;
00624 
00625       macro_flagA = L_has_fragile_macro_operand (opA);
00626 
00627       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
00628         {
00629           if (!L_add_opcode (opB))
00630             continue;
00631 
00632           if (Set_in (changed_opers, opB->id))
00633             continue;
00634 
00635           if (!(L_is_register (opB->src[0]) && L_is_register (opB->src[1])))
00636             continue;
00637 
00638           if (!(L_is_src_operand (opA->dest[0], opB)))
00639             continue;
00640 
00641           /* Dest of opA must only be used in opB */
00642           if (L_in_cb_OUT_set (cb, opA->dest[0]))
00643             continue;
00644 
00645           if (!(L_no_other_use_in_cb_after (cb, opA->dest[0], opA, opB)))
00646             continue;
00647 
00648           if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
00649             continue;
00650 
00651           if (!L_all_dest_operand_no_defs_between (opA, opA, opB))
00652             continue;
00653 
00654           /* Could be more aggressive here - JEP 12/97 */
00655           if (!L_all_src_operand_no_defs_between (opB, opA, opB))
00656             continue;
00657 
00658           if (!L_no_danger (macro_flagA, 0 /* load_flag */ ,
00659                             0 /* store_flag */ , opA, opB))
00660             break;
00661 
00662           /* Create dummy oper holding three add sources */
00663 
00664           temp_oper1 = L_create_new_op (Lop_NO_OP);
00665           temp_oper1->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
00666           temp_oper1->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[1]);
00667           if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[0]))
00668             temp_oper1->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[1]);
00669           else if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[1]))
00670             temp_oper1->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[0]);
00671           else
00672             L_punt ("Something wrong in add_regrouping 1");
00673 
00674           a_b_changed = 0;
00675           made_change = 0;
00676           for (opC = opA->next_op; opC != NULL; opC = opC->next_op)
00677             {
00678               if (!L_add_opcode (opC))
00679                 continue;
00680 
00681               if (Set_in (changed_opers, opC->id))
00682                 continue;
00683 
00684               if (opC->id == opB->id)
00685                 continue;
00686 
00687               if (!
00688                   (L_is_register (opC->src[0])
00689                    && L_is_register (opC->src[1])))
00690                 continue;
00691 
00692               if (L_same_src_operands (opA, opC))
00693                 continue;
00694 
00695               if (L_has_unsafe_macro_dest_operand (opC))
00696                 continue;
00697 
00698               macro_flagC = L_has_fragile_macro_operand (opC);
00699 
00700               for (opD = opC->next_op; opD != NULL; opD = opD->next_op)
00701                 {
00702 
00703                   if (!L_add_opcode (opD))
00704                     continue;
00705 
00706                   if (!
00707                       (L_is_register (opD->src[0])
00708                        && L_is_register (opD->src[1])))
00709                     continue;
00710 
00711                   if (!(L_is_src_operand (opC->dest[0], opD)))
00712                     continue;
00713 
00714                   if (Set_in (changed_opers, opD->id))
00715                     continue;
00716 
00717                   /* Dest of opC must only be used in opD */
00718                   if (L_in_cb_OUT_set (cb, opA->dest[0]))
00719                     continue;
00720 
00721                   if (!
00722                       (L_no_other_use_in_cb_after
00723                        (cb, opC->dest[0], opC, opD)))
00724                     continue;
00725 
00726                   if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opC, opD))
00727                     continue;
00728 
00729                   if (!L_all_dest_operand_no_defs_between (opC, opC, opD))
00730                     continue;
00731 
00732                   /* Could be more aggressive here - JEP 12/97 */
00733                   if (!L_all_src_operand_no_defs_between (opD, opC, opD))
00734                     continue;
00735 
00736                   if (!L_no_danger (macro_flagC, 0, 0, opC, opD))
00737                     break;
00738 
00739                   /* Create dummy oper holding three add sources */
00740 
00741                   temp_oper2 = L_create_new_op (Lop_NO_OP);
00742                   temp_oper2->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opC->src[0]);
00743                   temp_oper2->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opC->src[1]);
00744                   if (L_same_operand (opC->dest[0], opD->src[0]))
00745                     temp_oper2->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opD->src[1]);
00746                   else if (L_same_operand (opC->dest[0], opD->src[1]))
00747                     temp_oper2->src[2] = L_copy_operand (opD->src[0]);
00748                   else
00749                     L_punt ("Something wrong in add_regrouping 3");
00750 
00751                   if (a_b_changed)
00752                     {
00753                       /* Oper A and B sources have been changed, don't want
00754                          to change them again */
00755                       match0 = L_is_src_operand (opA->src[0], temp_oper2);
00756                       match1 = L_is_src_operand (opA->src[1], temp_oper2);
00757                       match2 = L_is_src_operand (opB->src[1], temp_oper2);
00758 
00759                       /* for match, C and D sources must share A sources 
00760                          but cannot share B source */
00761                       OK = match0 && match1 && !match2;
00762                     }
00763                   else
00764                     {
00765                       match0 =
00766                         L_is_src_operand (temp_oper1->src[0], temp_oper2);
00767                       match1 =
00768                         L_is_src_operand (temp_oper1->src[1], temp_oper2);
00769                       match2 =
00770                         L_is_src_operand (temp_oper1->src[2], temp_oper2);
00771 
00772                       /* any 2 src operand must be shared */
00773                       OK = (match0 + match1 + match2 == 2);
00774                     }
00775 
00776                   if (OK)
00777                     {
00778                       /* Going to make the change */
00779 #ifdef DEBUG_ADD_REGROUPING
00780 
00781                       Set_print (stderr, "previous changes:", changed_opers);
00782                       fprintf (stderr, "----- Found matching pair ------\n");
00783                       L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
00784                       L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
00785                       fprintf (stderr, "             -----\n");
00786                       L_print_oper (stderr, opC);
00787                       L_print_oper (stderr, opD);
00788                       fprintf (stderr,
00789                                "---------  changed to  ------------\n");
00790 #endif
00791 
00792                       if (a_b_changed)
00793                         {
00794                           for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00795                             {
00796                               L_delete_operand (opC->src[i]);
00797                               L_delete_operand (opD->src[i]);
00798                             }
00799 
00800                           /* use the same operands as oper A */
00801                           opC->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
00802                           opC->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[1]);
00803 
00804                           /* opD uses dest of oper C */
00805                           opD->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opC->dest[0]);
00806 
00807                           /* Find the source which isn't included in A/B */
00808                           if (!L_is_src_operand
00809                               (temp_oper2->src[0], temp_oper1))
00810                             {
00811                               opD->src[0] =
00812                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[0]);
00813                             }
00814                           else
00815                             if (!L_is_src_operand
00816                                 (temp_oper2->src[1], temp_oper1))
00817                             {
00818                               opD->src[0] =
00819                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[1]);
00820                             }
00821                           else
00822                             if (!L_is_src_operand
00823                                 (temp_oper2->src[2], temp_oper1))
00824                             {
00825                               opD->src[0] =
00826                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[2]);
00827                             }
00828                           else
00829                             {
00830                               L_punt ("Something wrong in add_regrouping 4");
00831                             }
00832 
00833                         }
00834 
00835                       else
00836                         {       /* Haven't yet changed A,B,C, or D */
00837 
00838                           for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00839                             {
00840                               L_delete_operand (opA->src[i]);
00841                               L_delete_operand (opB->src[i]);
00842                               L_delete_operand (opC->src[i]);
00843                               L_delete_operand (opD->src[i]);
00844                             }
00845 
00846                           /* opA uses dest of new oper B */
00847                           opB->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->dest[0]);
00848                           /* opD uses dest of new oper C */
00849                           opD->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opC->dest[0]);
00850 
00851                           index = 0;
00852                           if (match0)
00853                             {
00854                               opA->src[index] =
00855                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[0]);
00856                               opC->src[index] =
00857                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[0]);
00858                               index++;
00859                             }
00860                           else
00861                             {
00862                               opB->src[0] =
00863                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[0]);
00864                             }
00865                           if (match1)
00866                             {
00867                               opA->src[index] =
00868                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[1]);
00869                               opC->src[index] =
00870                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[1]);
00871                               index++;
00872                             }
00873                           else
00874                             {
00875                               opB->src[0] =
00876                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[1]);
00877                             }
00878                           if (match2)
00879                             {
00880                               opA->src[index] =
00881                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[2]);
00882                               opC->src[index] =
00883                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[2]);
00884                               index++;
00885                             }
00886                           else
00887                             {
00888                               opB->src[0] =
00889                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper1->src[2]);
00890                             }
00891 
00892                           if (!L_is_src_operand
00893                               (temp_oper2->src[0], temp_oper1))
00894                             {
00895                               opD->src[0] =
00896                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[0]);
00897                             }
00898                           else
00899                             if (!L_is_src_operand
00900                                 (temp_oper2->src[1], temp_oper1))
00901                             {
00902                               opD->src[0] =
00903                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[1]);
00904                             }
00905                           else
00906                             if (!L_is_src_operand
00907                                 (temp_oper2->src[2], temp_oper1))
00908                             {
00909                               opD->src[0] =
00910                                 L_copy_operand (temp_oper2->src[2]);
00911                             }
00912                           else
00913                             {
00914                               L_punt ("Something wrong in add_regrouping 3");
00915                             }
00916 
00917                           changed_opers = Set_add (changed_opers, opA->id);
00918                           changed_opers = Set_add (changed_opers, opB->id);
00919                           a_b_changed = 1;
00920 
00921                         }
00922 
00923                       changed_opers = Set_add (changed_opers, opC->id);
00924                       changed_opers = Set_add (changed_opers, opD->id);
00925                       change++;
00926                       made_change = 1;
00927 
00928 #ifdef DEBUG_ADD_REGROUPING
00929                       L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
00930                       L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
00931                       fprintf (stderr, "             -----\n");
00932                       L_print_oper (stderr, opC);
00933                       L_print_oper (stderr, opD);
00934                       fprintf (stderr,
00935                                "------------------- ------------\n\n\n");
00936 #endif
00937 
00938 
00939                     }
00940 
00941                   /* Delete the temporary oper */
00942                   L_insert_oper_before (cb, opC, temp_oper2);
00943                   L_delete_oper (cb, temp_oper2);
00944 
00945                   if (made_change)
00946                     {
00947                       break;
00948                     }
00949                 }               /* End of D loop */
00950             }                   /* End of opC loop */
00951 
00952           /* Now look for another opA/opB pair */
00953           L_insert_oper_before (cb, opA, temp_oper1);
00954           L_delete_oper (cb, temp_oper1);
00955           break;
00956         }
00957     }
00958 
00959   Set_dispose (changed_opers);
00960   return (change);
00961 }
00962 
00963 
00964 static int
00965 M_global_common_subexpression (L_Cb * cbA, L_Cb * cbB, int move_flags)
00966 {
00967   int i, change, new_opc;
00968   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *new_op;
00969   int macro_flag;
00970 
00971   change = 0;
00972 
00973   for (opA = cbA->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
00974     {
00975       if (!(L_general_arithmetic_opcode (opA) || L_general_move_opcode (opA)))
00976         continue;
00977       for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00978         if (opA->dest[i] && L_is_ctype_predicate (opA->dest[i]))
00979           break;
00980       if (i < L_max_dest_operand)
00981         continue;
00982       if (!L_different_src_and_dest_operands (opA))
00983         continue;
00984 
00985       macro_flag = L_has_fragile_macro_operand (opA);
00986 
00987       for (opB = cbB->first_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
00988         {
00989           /*
00990            *  match pattern
00991            */
00992 
00993           if (!L_compatible_opcodes (opA, opB))
00994             continue;
00995           if (!L_same_src_operands (opA, opB))
00996             continue;
00997 
00998           if (!L_different_src_and_dest_operands (opB))
00999             continue;
01000 
01001           /* Don't want the register/macro that will
01002              carry the value from opA to opB to be unsafe. MCM */
01003           if (L_has_unsafe_macro_dest_operand (opA))
01004             continue;
01005 
01006           if (L_has_unsafe_macro_dest_operand (opB))
01007             continue;
01008 
01009           if (!L_all_src_operand_global_same_def_reachs (opA, cbA, opA,
01010                                                          cbB, opB))
01011             continue;
01012 
01013           if (!L_all_dest_operand_global_no_defs_between (opA, cbA, opA,
01014                                                           cbB, opB))
01015             continue;
01016 
01017           if (!L_global_no_danger (macro_flag, 0, 0, cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01018             break;
01019 
01020           /*
01021            *  replace pattern
01022            */
01023           /* if opA and opB identical, just delete opB */
01024           if (L_same_dest_operands (opA, opB))
01025             {
01026               L_nullify_operation (opB);
01027               /* make flow analysis conservative, so dont have to redo it!! */
01028 
01029               /*
01030                * Don't need to do this for Exit boundary cb's
01031                */
01032               if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cbB->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
01033                 L_remove_from_all_EIN_set (opB);
01034             }
01035           /* move opcode, only optimize if move_flag set */
01036           else if (L_general_move_opcode (opA))
01037             {
01038               if (move_flags == 0)
01039                 continue;
01040               if (L_is_int_constant (opA->src[0]))
01041                 {
01042                   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (move_flags,
01043                                           L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_INT_CONSTANT))
01044                     continue;
01045                 }
01046               else if (L_is_flt_constant (opA->src[0]) ||
01047                        L_is_dbl_constant (opA->src[0]))
01048                 {
01049                   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (move_flags,
01050                                           L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_FLT_CONSTANT))
01051                     continue;
01052                 }
01053               else if (L_is_label (opA->src[0]))
01054                 {
01055                   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (move_flags,
01056                                           L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_LABEL_CONSTANT))
01057                     continue;
01058                 }
01059               else if (L_is_string (opA->src[0]))
01060                 {
01061                   if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (move_flags,
01062                                           L_COMMON_SUB_MOVES_WITH_STRING_CONSTANT))
01063                     continue;
01064                 }
01065               else
01066                 {
01067                   continue;
01068                 }
01069 
01070               L_delete_operand (opB->src[0]);
01071               opB->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->dest[0]);
01072               opB->proc_opc = TAHOEop_MOV_GR;
01073 
01074               /* make flow analysis conservative, so dont have to redo it!! */
01075               /*
01076                * Don't need to do this for Exit boundary cb's
01077                */
01078               if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cbB->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
01079                 L_remove_from_all_EIN_set (opB);
01080             }
01081           /* arithmetic op: if only 1 dest, just reuse opB for move op */
01082           else if (L_num_dest_operand (opA) == 1)
01083             {
01084               for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01085                 {
01086                   if (opA->dest[i] != NULL)
01087                     break;
01088                 }
01089 
01090               if (i == L_max_dest_operand)
01091                 L_punt ("M_global_common_subexpression: "
01092                         "all opA dest are NULL");
01093               L_convert_to_move (opB, L_copy_operand (opB->dest[i]),
01094                                  L_copy_operand (opA->dest[i]));
01095 
01096               /* make flow analysis conservative, so dont have to redo it!! */
01097               /*
01098                * Don't need to do this for Exit boundary cb's
01099                */
01100               if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cbB->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
01101                 L_remove_from_all_EIN_set (opB);
01102             }
01103           else
01104             {
01105               for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01106                 {
01107                   if (!opA->dest[i] && !opB->dest[i])
01108                     continue;
01109                   if (!opA->dest[i] || !opB->dest[i])
01110                     L_punt ("L_common_subexpression; illegal op");
01111                   new_opc = L_move_from_ctype (opB->dest[i]->ctype);
01112                   new_op = L_create_new_op (new_opc);
01113                   L_insert_oper_after (cbB, opB, new_op);
01114                   new_op->dest[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[i]);
01115                   new_op->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->dest[i]);
01116                 }
01117 
01118               L_nullify_operation (opB);
01119               MOD ("Flow analysis AD AE (due to global cse)");
01120               L_do_flow_analysis (L_fn, AVAILABLE_DEFINITION |
01121                                   AVAILABLE_EXPRESSION);
01122             }
01123 #ifdef TEST_GLOB_COMMON_SUB
01124           fprintf (stderr, "-> Global common sub: "
01125                    "op%d (cb %d) -> op%d (cb %d) : %lf\n",
01126                    opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, cbB->id, cbB->weight);
01127           if (cbA->region != cbB->region)
01128             Lopti_inter_region_global_common_sub_elim_wgt += cbB->weight;
01129 #endif
01130           change += 1;
01131         }
01132     }
01133   return change;
01134 }
01135 
01136 
01137 static int
01138 M_local_redmov_removal (L_Cb * cb)
01139 {
01140   int change = 0;
01141   L_Oper *op, *next_op;
01142 
01143   for (op = cb->first_op; op != NULL; op = next_op)
01144     {
01145       next_op = op->next_op;
01146 
01147       if (!L_move_opcode (op))
01148         continue;
01149       if (op->proc_opc == TAHOEop_MOVL)
01150         continue;
01151       if (!L_is_variable (op->src[0]))
01152         continue;
01153       if (L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (op))
01154         continue;
01155 
01156       if (L_same_operand (op->dest[0], op->src[0]))
01157         {
01158           L_delete_oper (cb, op);
01159           change++;
01160         }
01161     }
01162 
01163   return change;
01164 }
01165 
01166 
01167 static int
01168 M_global_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cbA, L_Cb * cbB)
01169 {
01170   int i, change = 0;
01171   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *new_oper;
01172 
01173   for (opA = cbA->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
01174     {
01175       if (!L_move_opcode (opA))
01176         continue;
01177       if (opA->proc_opc == TAHOEop_MOVL)
01178         continue;
01179       if (!L_is_variable (opA->src[0]))
01180         continue;
01181       if (L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (opA))
01182         continue;
01183 
01184       for (opB = cbB->first_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
01185         {
01186           int macro_flag;
01187           /*
01188            *  match pattern
01189            */
01190           if (!L_is_src_operand (opA->dest[0], opB))
01191             continue;
01192           if (!L_can_change_src_operand (opB, opA->dest[0]))
01193             continue;
01194           if (!L_global_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01195             continue;
01196           if (!L_global_same_def_reachs (opA->src[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01197             continue;
01198           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]) ||
01199                         L_is_fragile_macro (opA->src[0]));
01200 
01201           if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cbB->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
01202             {
01203               /* Conventional global copy propagation */
01204               if (!L_global_no_danger (macro_flag, 0, 0, cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01205                 break;
01206 
01207               /*
01208                *  replace pattern
01209                */
01210               for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
01211                 {
01212                   if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[i]))
01213                     {
01214 #ifdef TEST_GLOB_COPY_PROP
01215                       fprintf (stderr,
01216                                "-> Global copy prop: "
01217                                "op%d (cb%d) -> op%d src%d (cb%d) : %lf\n",
01218                                opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, i, cbB->id,
01219                                cbB->weight);
01220                       if (cbA->region != cbB->region)
01221                         Lopti_inter_region_global_copy_prop_wgt +=
01222                           cbB->weight;
01223 #endif
01224                       L_delete_operand (opB->src[i]);
01225                       opB->src[i] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
01226                       change += 1;
01227                     }
01228                 }
01229               /* make flow analysis conservative, so dont have to redo it!! */
01230               L_remove_from_all_EIN_set (opB);
01231             }
01232           else
01233             {
01234               if (!L_global_no_danger_to_boundary (macro_flag, 0, 0,
01235                                                    cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01236                 break;
01237 
01238               if (opB->opc == Lop_DEFINE)
01239                 {
01240                   /* 
01241                    * The oper in CbB is a liveness boundary oper, so the
01242                    * operand cannot be replace.  Let's just copy the move
01243                    * operand instead and it will be pushed outside 
01244                    * the region. :)
01245                    */
01246                   int safe = 1;
01247                   for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01248                     {
01249                       if (opA->dest[i] == NULL)
01250                         continue;
01251                       if (!L_is_register (opA->dest[i]))
01252                         {
01253                           safe = 0;
01254                           break;
01255                         }
01256                     }
01257                   if (safe == 1)
01258                     {
01259                       new_oper = L_copy_operation (opA);
01260                       L_insert_oper_before (cbB,
01261                                             (L_Oper *)
01262                                             L_region_boundary_insert_point
01263                                             (cbB), new_oper);
01264                       change += 1;
01265 #ifdef TEST_GLOB_COPY_PROP
01266                       fprintf (stderr,
01267                                "Global copy prop (region): "
01268                                "op%d (cb%d) -> op%d src%d (cb%d) : %lf\n",
01269                                opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, i, cbB->id,
01270                                cbB->weight);
01271 #endif
01272                     }
01273                 }
01274               else
01275                 {
01276                   /*
01277                    *  replace the oper in the boundary cb normally.
01278                    */
01279                   for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
01280                     {
01281                       if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[i]))
01282                         {
01283 #ifdef TEST_GLOB_COPY_PROP
01284                           fprintf (stderr,
01285                                    "Global copy prop (region): "
01286                                    "op%d (cb%d) -> op%d src%d (cb%d) : %lf\n",
01287                                    opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, i, cbB->id,
01288                                    cbB->weight);
01289 #endif
01290                           L_delete_operand (opB->src[i]);
01291                           opB->src[i] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
01292                           change += 1;
01293                         }
01294                     }
01295                 }
01296             }
01297         }
01298     }
01299   return change;
01300 }
01301 
01302 
01303 /* Modified from Lopti so that it does not operate on
01304    software pipelined loops. */
01305 
01306 #define MAX_NUM_GLOB_ITERATION 10
01307 
01308 static int
01309 Mopti_global_dead_code_optimization (L_Func * fn)
01310 {
01311   int k, change, opti_applied;
01312   L_Cb *cb;
01313 
01314   if (Lopti_do_global_opti == 0)
01315     return (0);
01316 
01317   opti_applied = 0;
01318 
01319   if (Lopti_debug_global_opti)
01320     {
01321       fprintf (stderr, "\n");
01322       fprintf (stderr, "> ENTER global dead code removal (fn %s)\n",
01323                fn->name);
01324       fprintf (stderr, "\n");
01325     }
01326 
01327   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb != NULL; cb = cb->next_cb)
01328     {
01329       if (L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cb->flags, L_CB_SOFTPIPE) &&
01330           L_find_attr (cb->attr, "kernel"))
01331         continue;
01332 
01333       for (k = 0; k < MAX_NUM_GLOB_ITERATION; k++)
01334         {
01335           int c1 = 0;
01336 
01337           if (Lopti_do_global_dead_code_rem)
01338             {
01339               c1 = L_global_dead_code_removal (cb);
01340               Lopti_cnt_global_dead_code_rem += c1;
01341             }
01342 
01343           change = c1;
01344           Lopti_cnt_global_opti += change;
01345           if (change != 0)
01346             opti_applied = 1;
01347           if (change == 0)
01348             break;
01349         }
01350     }
01351 
01352   return (opti_applied);
01353 }
01354 
01355 
01356 #define MAX_RD 16
01357 
01358 
01359 static int
01360 Mopti_redundant_ext_rev_set (L_Func * fn, L_Oper * oper, Set rd_set)
01361 {
01362   int i, rd_cnt, *rd_id;
01363   L_Oper *prod_oper;
01364 
01365   if (!(rd_cnt = Set_size (rd_set)))
01366     return 0;
01367 
01368   rd_id = alloca (rd_cnt * sizeof (int));
01369 
01370   Set_2array (rd_set, rd_id);
01371 
01372   for (i = 0; i < rd_cnt; i++)
01373     {
01374       prod_oper = L_oper_hash_tbl_find_oper (fn->oper_hash_tbl, rd_id[i]);
01375 
01376       if (!L_redundant_extension_rev (prod_oper, oper))
01377         break;
01378     }
01379 
01380   return (i == rd_cnt);
01381 }
01382 
01383 int
01384 Mopti_global_sxt_elimination (L_Func * fn)
01385 {
01386   L_Cb *cb;
01387   L_Oper *oper, *prod_oper, *cons_oper;
01388 
01389   int change = 0;
01390   int size, cond_size, match;
01391 
01392   int i, rd_cnt, rd_id[MAX_RD];
01393   Set rd_set;
01394 
01395   for (cb = fn->first_cb; cb; cb = cb->next_cb)
01396     {
01397       for (oper = cb->last_op; oper; oper = oper->prev_op)
01398         {
01399           /* Pattern 0: Using RD, find sign / zero extends of
01400            * constants with multiple "extend-safe" reaching defs
01401            */
01402 
01403           if (!L_sign_or_zero_extend_opcode (oper))
01404             continue;
01405 
01406           rd_set = L_get_oper_RIN_defining_opers (oper, oper->src[0]);
01407 
01408           if (Mopti_redundant_ext_rev_set (fn, oper, rd_set))
01409             {
01410               L_change_opcode (oper, Lop_MOV);
01411               Set_dispose (rd_set);
01412               change++;
01413               continue;
01414             }                   /* if */
01415 
01416           /*
01417            *    match pattern 1
01418            *     Look for a load of a char or a short
01419            *     that undergoes sign extension and is compared only
01420            *     to a postive constant that is less than the sxt size.
01421            *     Eliminate the sxt.
01422            */
01423 
01424           rd_cnt = (Set_size (rd_set) <= MAX_RD) ?
01425             Set_2array (rd_set, rd_id) : 0;
01426 
01427           Set_dispose (rd_set);
01428 
01429           if (!rd_cnt)
01430             continue;
01431 
01432           if (oper->proc_opc == TAHOEop_SXT1)
01433             size = 1;
01434           else if (oper->proc_opc == TAHOEop_SXT2)
01435             size = 2;
01436           else if (oper->proc_opc == TAHOEop_SXT4)
01437             size = 4;
01438           else
01439             continue;
01440 
01441           for (i = 0; i < rd_cnt; i++)
01442             {
01443               prod_oper = L_oper_hash_tbl_find_oper (fn->oper_hash_tbl,
01444                                                      rd_id[i]);
01445 
01446               switch (prod_oper->proc_opc)
01447                 {
01448                 case TAHOEop_LD1:
01449                   if (size == 1)
01450                     continue;
01451                   break;
01452                 case TAHOEop_LD2:
01453                   if (size == 2)
01454                     continue;
01455                   break;
01456                 case TAHOEop_LD4:
01457                   if (size == 4)
01458                     continue;
01459                   break;
01460                 default:
01461                   break;
01462                 }               /* switch */
01463               break;
01464             }                   /* for i */
01465 
01466           if (i < rd_cnt)
01467             continue;
01468 
01469           rd_set = L_get_oper_ROUT_using_opers (oper, oper->dest[0]);
01470 
01471           rd_cnt = (Set_size (rd_set) <= MAX_RD) ?
01472             Set_2array (rd_set, rd_id) : 0;
01473 
01474           Set_dispose (rd_set);
01475 
01476           if (!rd_cnt)
01477             continue;
01478 
01479           /* Check to see if the consumers are subword compares of r0
01480              or a constant between 0 and 127 or 0 and 2^15 - 1 or 0
01481              and 2^31-1. */
01482 
01483           cond_size = 0;
01484           match = 0;
01485           for (i = 0; i < rd_cnt; i++)
01486             {
01487               cons_oper = L_oper_hash_tbl_find_oper (fn->oper_hash_tbl,
01488                                                      rd_id[i]);
01489 
01490               if (!L_int_pred_comparison_opcode (cons_oper))
01491                 break;
01492 
01493               if (!L_gen_eq_cmp_opcode (cons_oper) &&
01494                   !L_gen_ne_cmp_opcode (cons_oper))
01495                 break;
01496 
01497               if (cond_size == 0)
01498                 cond_size = L_get_compare_ctype (cons_oper);
01499               else if (cond_size != L_get_compare_ctype (cons_oper))
01500                 break;
01501 
01502               if (!LT_is_R0_operand (cons_oper->src[0]))
01503                 {
01504                   if (size == 1)
01505                     {
01506                       if (!L_is_int_constant (cons_oper->src[0]) ||
01507                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i < 0 ||
01508                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i > 0x7F)
01509                         break;
01510                     }           /* if */
01511                   else if (size == 2)
01512                     {
01513                       if (!L_is_int_constant (cons_oper->src[0]) ||
01514                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i < 0 ||
01515                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i > 0x7FFF)
01516                         break;
01517                     }           /* else if */
01518                   else if (size == 4)
01519                     {
01520                       if (!L_is_int_constant (cons_oper->src[0]) ||
01521                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i < 0 ||
01522                           cons_oper->src[0]->value.i > 0x7FFFFFFF)
01523                         break;
01524                     }           /* else if */
01525                   else
01526                     {
01527                       break;
01528                     }           /* else */
01529                 }               /* if */
01530                match = 1;
01531             }                   /* for i */
01532 
01533           if (i != rd_cnt)
01534             {
01535 #if 0
01536               if (match)
01537                 {
01538                   /* Not all consumers matched, but at least one did.
01539                    * Make a partial fix.  This can increase register
01540                    * pressure.
01541                    */
01542                   fprintf (stderr, "GSE missed opportunity\n");
01543                 }
01544 #endif
01545             }
01546           else
01547             {
01548               L_change_opcode (oper, Lop_MOV);
01549           
01550 #ifdef DEBUG_SXT_ELIM
01551           fprintf (stderr, "Mopti_global_sxt_elimination 1: "
01552                    "applied to op %d [size %d].\n", oper->id, size);
01553 #endif
01554 
01555               change++;
01556             }
01557         }                       /* for oper */
01558     }                           /* for cb */
01559 
01560 #ifdef DEBUG_SXT_ELIM
01561   fprintf (stderr, ">> SXT_ELIM: %d\n", change);
01562 #endif
01563 
01564   return change;
01565 }                               /* Mopti_global_sxt_elimination */
01566 
01567 
01568 static int
01569 M_global_cmp_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cbA, L_Cb * cbB)
01570 {
01571   int change;
01572   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
01573 
01574   change = 0;
01575   for (opA = cbA->first_op; opA; opA = opA->next_op)
01576     {
01577       if (!L_int_pred_comparison_opcode (opA) ||
01578           (opA->com[1] != Lcmp_COM_EQ) ||
01579           !opA->pred[0] ||
01580           !L_is_macro (opA->src[0]) ||
01581           (opA->src[0]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO) ||
01582           !L_is_macro (opA->src[1]) ||
01583           (opA->src[1]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO) ||
01584           (opA->dest[0]->ptype != L_PTYPE_UNCOND_T))
01585         continue;
01586 
01587       for (opB = cbB->first_op; opB; opB = opB->next_op)
01588         {
01589           if (!opB->pred[0])
01590             continue;
01591           if (!L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->pred[0]))
01592             continue;
01593 
01594           if (!L_global_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01595             continue;
01596           if (!L_global_same_def_reachs (opA->pred[0], cbA, opA, cbB, opB))
01597             continue;
01598 
01599           if (!L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (cbB->flags, L_CB_EXIT_BOUNDARY))
01600             {
01601               /*
01602                *  replace pattern
01603                */
01604 #define TEST_GLOB_COPY_PROP
01605 #ifdef TEST_GLOB_COPY_PROP
01606               printf ("Global CMP copy prop: op%d (cb%d) -> op%d (cb%d)\n",
01607                       opA->id, cbA->id, opB->id, cbB->id);
01608 
01609 #endif
01610               L_delete_operand (opB->pred[0]);
01611               opB->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->pred[0]);
01612               change += 1;
01613 
01614               /* make flow analysis conservative, so dont have to redo it!! */
01615               L_remove_from_all_EIN_set (opB);
01616             }
01617         }
01618     }
01619   return change;
01620 }
01621 
01622 
01623 static int
01624 M_local_cmp_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cb)
01625 {
01626   int change;
01627   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
01628   change = 0;
01629 
01630   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
01631     {
01632       /*
01633        *        match pattern
01634        */
01635 
01636       if (!L_int_pred_comparison_opcode (opA) ||
01637           (opA->com[1] != Lcmp_COM_EQ) ||
01638           !opA->pred[0] ||
01639           !L_is_macro (opA->src[0]) ||
01640           (opA->src[0]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO) ||
01641           !L_is_macro (opA->src[1]) ||
01642           (opA->src[1]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO) ||
01643           (opA->dest[0]->ptype != L_PTYPE_UNCOND_T))
01644         continue;
01645 
01646       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
01647         {
01648           /*
01649            *    match pattern
01650            */
01651           if (!opB->pred[0])
01652             continue;
01653           if (!L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->pred[0]))
01654             continue;
01655 
01656           if (!(L_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB)))
01657             break;
01658           if (!(L_same_def_reachs (opA->pred[0], opA, opB)))
01659             continue;
01660 
01661           /*
01662            *    replace pattern.
01663            */
01664 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP1
01665           printf ("Local CMP copy prop: op%d -> op%d, (cb %d)\n",
01666                   opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
01667 #endif
01668 
01669           L_delete_operand (opB->pred[0]);
01670           opB->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opA->pred[0]);
01671           change += 1;
01672         }
01673     }
01674 
01675   return change;
01676 }
01677 
01678 
01679 static int
01680 M_local_cmp_rev_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cb)
01681 {
01682   int i, change, redef, redo_flow, redef_w, redef_z, bad_redef;
01683   int not_uncond;
01684   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *ptr, *new_op;
01685   change = 0;
01686   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA; opA = opA->next_op)
01687     {
01688       if (L_is_opcode (Lop_DEFINE, opA))
01689         continue;
01690       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB; opB = opB->next_op)
01691         {
01692           /*
01693            *    match pattern
01694            */
01695 
01696           if (!L_int_pred_comparison_opcode (opB))
01697             continue;
01698           if (!L_is_macro (opB->src[0]) || !L_is_macro (opB->src[1]))
01699             continue;
01700           if (opB->src[0]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO ||
01701               opB->src[1]->value.mac != TAHOE_MAC_ZERO)
01702             continue;
01703           if (opB->com[1] != Lcmp_COM_EQ)
01704             continue;
01705           if (opB->dest[0]->ptype != L_PTYPE_UNCOND_T)
01706             continue;
01707           if (!opB->pred[0])
01708             continue;
01709 
01710           if (!(L_is_dest_operand (opB->pred[0], opA)))
01711             continue;
01712           if (!(L_no_defs_between (opB->pred[0], opA, opB)))
01713             break;
01714           if (!(L_same_def_reachs (opB->dest[0], opA, opB)))
01715             continue;
01716           if (!(L_not_live_at_cb_end (cb, opA, opB->pred[0])))
01717             continue;
01718 
01719           if (!(L_no_uses_between (opB->dest[0], opA, opB)))
01720             continue;
01721           if (!(L_no_defs_between (opB->dest[0], opA, opB)))
01722             continue;
01723           if (!(L_no_uses_between (opB->pred[0], opA, opB)))
01724             continue;
01725           if (!(L_can_change_all_later_uses_with (cb, opB->pred[0],
01726                                                   opB->dest[0], opB)))
01727             continue;
01728           if (!(L_no_br_between (opA, opB)))
01729             continue;
01730 
01731           /* Only propagate back into uncond types
01732            */
01733           not_uncond = 0;
01734           for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01735             {
01736               if (!opA->dest[i])
01737                 continue;
01738               if (!(L_same_operand (opB->pred[0], opA->dest[i])))
01739                 continue;
01740               if (opA->dest[i]->ptype != L_PTYPE_UNCOND_T)
01741                 not_uncond = 1;
01742             }
01743           if (not_uncond)
01744             continue;
01745 
01746           /*
01747            * Avoid pattern:
01748            *     A: use w = x,y
01749            *     B: mov z = w
01750            *        ...
01751            *        z = ?
01752            *          = w
01753            */
01754 
01755           /*  DIA, JWS - This checks for a redef on either operand
01756            * which would require placing a move instruction in the
01757            * current cb.  In this case the optimization is not
01758            * performed.  
01759            */
01760           redef_w = redef_z = bad_redef = 0;
01761           for (ptr = opB->next_op; ptr; ptr = ptr->next_op)
01762             {
01763               for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01764                 {
01765                   if (L_same_operand (opB->pred[0], ptr->dest[i]))
01766                     {
01767                       if (ptr->dest[i]->ptype == L_PTYPE_UNCOND_T ||
01768                           ptr->dest[i]->ptype == L_PTYPE_UNCOND_F)
01769                         {
01770                           redef_w = 1;  /* w is clobbered */
01771                           break;
01772                         }
01773                       else
01774                         bad_redef = 1;  /* Can't handle partial redefine of w */
01775                     }
01776                   if (L_same_operand (opB->dest[0], ptr->dest[i]))
01777                     redef_z = 1;
01778                   /* Once z is redefined, need to check for further uses of
01779                    * w which would require a mov w,z in this cb
01780                    */
01781                 }
01782               if (redef_z)
01783                 {
01784                   if (L_general_branch_opcode (ptr) ||
01785                       L_check_branch_opcode (ptr))
01786                     {
01787                       if (L_in_oper_OUT_set
01788                           (cb, ptr, opB->pred[0], TAKEN_PATH))
01789                         {
01790                           bad_redef = 1;
01791                           break;
01792                         }
01793                     }
01794                   if (L_same_operand (opB->pred[0], ptr->pred[0]))
01795                     {
01796                       bad_redef = 1;
01797                       break;
01798                     }
01799                 }
01800               if (bad_redef)
01801                 break;
01802 
01803               if (redef_w)
01804                 break;
01805             }
01806           if (bad_redef)
01807             continue;
01808 
01809           /*
01810            *    replace pattern.
01811            *
01812            *    Change all later uses of opB->src[0] to opB->dest[0],
01813            *    stop when opB->src[0] is redefined.  Also, at any
01814            *    branch oper which opB->src[0] is live, insert
01815            *    opB->src[0] <- opB->dest[0] to ensure correct
01816            *    execution.  
01817            */
01818 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP2
01819           printf ("Rev copy prop op%d -> op%d (cb %d)\n",
01820                   opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
01821 #endif
01822           redef = 0;
01823           redo_flow = 0;
01824           for (ptr = opA->next_op; ptr; ptr = ptr->next_op)
01825             {
01826               if (ptr == opB)
01827                 continue;
01828               if (L_general_branch_opcode (ptr) ||
01829                   L_check_branch_opcode (ptr))
01830                 {
01831                   if (L_in_oper_OUT_set (cb, ptr, opB->pred[0], TAKEN_PATH))
01832                     {
01833                       redo_flow = 1;
01834                       new_op = L_create_new_op (opB->opc);
01835 
01836                       new_op->dest[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->pred[0]);
01837                       new_op->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
01838                       new_op->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[0]);
01839                       new_op->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[1]);
01840                       new_op->com[0] = opB->com[0];
01841                       new_op->com[1] = opB->com[1];
01842 
01843                       L_insert_op_at_dest_of_br (cb, ptr, new_op, 0);
01844 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP2
01845                       printf ("Placing cmp op %d at dest of br op %d\n",
01846                               new_op->id, ptr->id);
01847 #endif
01848                     }
01849                 }
01850               if (L_same_operand (opB->pred[0], ptr->pred[0]))
01851                 {
01852                   L_delete_operand (ptr->pred[0]);
01853                   ptr->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
01854                 }
01855 
01856               for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01857                 {
01858                   if (L_same_operand (opB->pred[0], ptr->dest[i]))
01859                     redef = 1;
01860                 }
01861               if (redef)
01862                 break;
01863             }
01864           /* 8/14/96, Bob McGowan */
01865           if (!ptr)
01866             {
01867               /* If the pointer is NULL, then we know the above loop went
01868                  through the entire cb.
01869                  Check the live variables through the fall through path.
01870                  If the src of the mov is live out, then we must put
01871                  mov src = dest in the fall though block */
01872 
01873               /*  if( L_in_oper_OUT_set( cb, cb->last_op, opB->src[0],
01874                  FALL_THRU_PATH )) */
01875 
01876               if ((!L_general_branch_opcode (cb->last_op)) &&
01877                   (!L_check_branch_opcode (cb->last_op)) &&
01878                   (!L_subroutine_return_opcode (cb->last_op)) &&
01879                   (L_in_cb_IN_set (cb->next_cb, opB->src[0])))
01880                 {
01881                   redo_flow = 1;
01882                   new_op = L_create_new_op (opB->opc);
01883 
01884                   new_op->dest[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->pred[0]);
01885                   new_op->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
01886                   new_op->src[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[0]);
01887                   new_op->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opB->src[1]);
01888                   new_op->com[0] = opB->com[0];
01889                   new_op->com[1] = opB->com[1];
01890 
01891                   L_insert_op_at_fallthru_dest (cb, new_op, 0);
01892 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP2
01893                   printf ("Placing mov op %d at fall thru\n", new_op->id);
01894 #endif
01895                 }
01896             }
01897           for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
01898             {
01899               if (!L_same_operand (opA->dest[i], opB->pred[0]))
01900                 continue;
01901               L_delete_operand (opA->dest[i]);
01902               opA->dest[i] = L_copy_operand (opB->dest[0]);
01903             }
01904           L_nullify_operation (opB);
01905 
01906           if (redo_flow)
01907             {
01908               MOD ("Flow analysis LV (due to rev cp pr)");
01909               L_do_flow_analysis (L_fn, LIVE_VARIABLE);
01910             }
01911           change += 1;
01912         }
01913     }
01914   return change;
01915 }
01916 
01917 
01918 int
01919 M_local_constant_folding (L_Cb * cb)
01920 {
01921   int change = 0;
01922   ITint64 sum;
01923   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
01924   L_Operand *dest, *src;
01925 
01926   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
01927     {
01928       /*
01929        * adds   rY = c, rX  --> adds   rY = c, rX
01930        * adds   rZ = d, rY  --> adds   rZ = c+d, rX
01931        */
01932 
01933       if (opA->proc_opc != TAHOEop_ADDS)
01934         continue;
01935 
01936       dest = opA->dest[0];
01937       src = opA->src[1];
01938 
01939       if (!L_is_int_constant (opA->src[0]))
01940         continue;
01941 
01942       if (L_same_operand (src, dest))
01943         continue;
01944 
01945       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
01946         {
01947           if (!PG_intersecting_predicates_ops (opA, opB))
01948             continue;
01949 
01950           if (L_general_subroutine_call_opcode (opB))
01951             break;
01952 
01953           if (L_is_dest_operand (dest, opB))
01954             break;
01955 
01956           if (L_is_dest_operand (src, opB))
01957             break;
01958 
01959           if (opB->proc_opc != TAHOEop_ADDS)
01960             continue;
01961           if (!L_is_int_constant (opB->src[0]))
01962             continue;
01963           if (!L_same_operand (dest, opB->src[1]))
01964             continue;
01965           if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
01966             continue;
01967           sum = opA->src[0]->value.i + opB->src[0]->value.i;
01968 
01969           if (!SIMM_14 (sum))
01970             continue;
01971 
01972           /* PERFORM */
01973 
01974 #ifdef DEBUG_CONSTANT_FOLDING
01975           fprintf (stderr, "Constant folding performed:\n");
01976           L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
01977           L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
01978 #endif
01979 
01980           opB->src[0]->value.i = sum;
01981 
01982           L_delete_operand (opB->src[1]);
01983 
01984           opB->src[1] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[1]);
01985 
01986           change++;
01987         }
01988     }
01989   return change;
01990 }
01991 
01992 
01993 /*
01994  * pattern:      mov x = y
01995  *               use z = w,x
01996  *
01997  */
01998 
01999 int
02000 M_local_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cb, int use_dem)
02001 {
02002   int i, change;
02003   int extA;
02004   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
02005   int replace_opc;
02006 
02007   change = 0;
02008   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA != NULL; opA = opA->next_op)
02009     {
02010       /*
02011        *        match pattern
02012        */
02013 
02014       if (L_move_opcode (opA))
02015         extA = 0;
02016       else if (L_sign_or_zero_extend_opcode (opA))
02017         extA = 1;
02018       else
02019         continue;
02020 
02021       if (!(L_is_variable (opA->src[0])) || L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (opA))
02022         continue;
02023 
02024       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
02025         {
02026           int macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag;
02027           /*
02028            *    match pattern
02029            */
02030           if (!(L_is_src_operand (opA->dest[0], opB)))
02031             continue;
02032           if (extA && !L_redundant_extension_fwd (opA, opB))
02033             {
02034               if (L_move_opcode (opB))
02035                 {
02036                   replace_opc = 1;
02037                 }
02038               else if (L_sign_or_zero_extend_opcode (opB))
02039                 {
02040                   int ctA, ctB;
02041 
02042                   ctA = L_opcode_ctype (opA);
02043                   ctB = L_opcode_ctype (opB);
02044 
02045                   if (L_extension_compatible_ctype (ctA, ctB))
02046                     replace_opc = 1;
02047                   else
02048                     continue;
02049                 }
02050               else
02051                 {
02052                   continue;
02053                 }
02054             }
02055           else
02056             {
02057               replace_opc = 0;
02058             }
02059 
02060           if (L_is_macro (opA->src[0]) && M_subroutine_call (opB->opc))
02061             continue;
02062           if (!(L_can_change_src_operand (opB, opA->dest[0])))
02063             continue;
02064           if (use_dem && opB->pred[1])
02065             {
02066               if (!PG_subset_predicate_ops_explicit (opB, 1, opA, 0))
02067                 continue;
02068             }
02069           else
02070             {
02071               if (!PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
02072                 continue;
02073             }
02074           if (!(L_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB)))
02075             break;
02076           if (!(L_same_def_reachs (opA->src[0], opA, opB)))
02077             continue;
02078           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]) ||
02079                         L_is_fragile_macro (opA->src[0]));
02080           load_flag = 0;
02081           store_flag = 0;
02082           if (!(L_no_danger (macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag, opA, opB)))
02083             break;
02084           /*
02085            *    replace pattern.
02086            */
02087 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP1
02088           fprintf (stderr,
02089                    "> M_local_copy_propagation: op%d -> op%d, (cb %d)\n",
02090                    opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
02091           L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
02092           L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
02093 #endif
02094 
02095           if (replace_opc)
02096             {
02097               L_change_opcode (opB, opA->opc);
02098               opB->proc_opc = opA->proc_opc;
02099             }
02100 
02101           for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
02102             {
02103               if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[i]))
02104                 {
02105                   L_delete_operand (opB->src[i]);
02106                   opB->src[i] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
02107                   change += 1;
02108                 }
02109             }
02110 
02111 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP1
02112           fprintf (stderr, "  becomes\n");
02113           L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
02114           L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
02115 #endif
02116         }
02117     }
02118 
02119   return change;
02120 }
02121 
02122 
02123 /* M_local_rev_copy_propagation (L_Cb *cb, int use_dem)
02124  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
02125  * A: w = 
02126  * B: z = w
02127  */
02128 
02129 int
02130 M_local_rev_copy_propagation (L_Cb * cb, int use_dem)
02131 {
02132   int change = 0, extA;
02133   L_Oper *opA, *opB, *opC;
02134 
02135   for (opB = cb->first_op; opB; opB = opB->next_op)
02136     {
02137       L_Operand *opdW, *opdZ;
02138       int stop = 0;
02139 
02140       if (L_move_opcode (opB))
02141         extA = 0;
02142       else if (L_sign_or_zero_extend_opcode (opB))
02143         extA = 1;
02144       else
02145         continue;
02146 
02147       if (L_has_unsafe_macro_operand (opB))
02148         continue;
02149 
02150       opdW = opB->src[0];
02151       opdZ = opB->dest[0];
02152 
02153       if (L_is_macro (opdW))
02154         continue;
02155 
02156       for (opA = opB->prev_op; opA && !stop; opA = opA->prev_op)
02157         {
02158           int macro_flag, i, partial = 0;
02159 
02160           if (!PG_intersecting_predicates_ops (opA, opB))
02161             continue;
02162 
02163           /* filter */
02164 
02165           if (L_general_branch_opcode (opA) || L_check_branch_opcode (opA))
02166             stop = 1;
02167 
02168           if (L_is_src_operand (opdZ, opA))
02169             stop = 1;
02170 
02171           if (L_is_dest_operand (opdZ, opA))
02172             stop = 1;
02173 
02174           /* match exactly once */
02175 
02176           if (!(L_is_dest_operand (opdW, opA)))
02177             continue;
02178 
02179           /* W is redefined by opA.  Further upward search is futile! */
02180 
02181           if (L_is_opcode (Lop_DEFINE, opA))
02182             break;
02183 
02184           if (extA && !L_redundant_extension_rev (opA, opB))
02185             break;
02186 
02187           if (use_dem && opA->pred[1] &&
02188               !PG_equivalent_predicates_ops_explicit (opA, 0, opA, 1))
02189             {
02190               if (!PG_equivalent_predicates_ops_explicit (opA, 1, opB, 0))
02191                 break;
02192               if (!L_same_def_reachs (opB->pred[0], opA, opB))
02193                 break;
02194               partial = 1;
02195             }
02196           else
02197             {
02198               if (!PG_equivalent_predicates_ops (opA, opB))
02199                 break;
02200             }
02201 
02202           if (!(L_can_change_dest_operand (opA, opdZ)))
02203             break;
02204 
02205           if (L_is_macro (opdZ) && !(L_single_use_of (cb, opdW, opA)))
02206             break;
02207           if (!(L_not_live_at_cb_end (cb, opA, opdW)))
02208             break;
02209           if (!(L_same_def_reachs (opdZ, opA, opB)))
02210             break;
02211           if (partial && !(L_no_uses_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB)))
02212             break;
02213           if (!(L_can_change_all_uses_between (cb, opdW, opdZ, opA, opB)))
02214             break;
02215           if (!(L_can_change_all_later_uses_with (cb, opdW, opdZ, opB)))
02216             break;
02217 
02218           macro_flag = (L_is_fragile_macro (opdZ)
02219                         || L_is_fragile_macro (opdW));
02220 
02221           if (!(L_no_danger (macro_flag, 0, 0, opA, opB)))
02222             break;
02223 
02224           {
02225             /*
02226              * Avoid pattern:
02227              *     A: use w =
02228              *     B: mov z = w
02229              *        ...
02230              *        z = ?
02231              *          = w
02232              */
02233 
02234             /*  DIA, JWS - This checks for a redef on either operand
02235              * which would require placing a move instruction in the
02236              * current cb.  In this case the optimization is not
02237              * performed.  
02238              */
02239             int redef_w = 0, redef_z = 0, bad_redef = 0;
02240 
02241             for (opC = opB->next_op; opC; opC = opC->next_op)
02242               {
02243                 if (!PG_intersecting_predicates_ops (opB, opC))
02244                   continue;
02245 
02246                 if (L_is_dest_operand (opdW, opC))
02247                   {
