02248                     if (PG_superset_predicate_ops (opC, opB))
02249                       redef_w = 1;
02250                     else
02251                       bad_redef = 1;
02252                   }
02253 
02254                 if (!redef_z && L_is_dest_operand (opdZ, opC))
02255                   redef_z = 1;
02256 
02257                 /* Once z is redefined, need to check for further uses of
02258                  * w which would require a mov w,z in this cb
02259                  */
02260 
02261                 if (redef_z && L_is_src_operand (opdW, opC))
02262                   bad_redef = 1;
02263 
02264                 /* Don't want to put moves in other blocks either */
02265 
02266                 if ((L_general_branch_opcode (opC) ||
02267                      L_check_branch_opcode (opC)) &&
02268                     L_in_oper_OUT_set (cb, opC, opdW, TAKEN_PATH))
02269                   bad_redef = 1;
02270 
02271                 if (bad_redef || redef_w)
02272                   break;
02273               }
02274 
02275             if (bad_redef)
02276               break;
02277           }
02278 
02279           /*
02280            *    replace pattern.
02281            *
02282            *    Change all later uses of opdW to opdZ,
02283            *    stop when opdW is redefined.  Also, at any
02284            *    branch oper which opdW is live, insert
02285            *    opdW <- opdZ to ensure correct
02286            *    execution.  
02287            */
02288 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP2
02289           fprintf (stderr,
02290                    "> M_local_rev_copy_propagation:  op%d -> op%d (cb %d)\n",
02291                    opA->id, opB->id, cb->id);
02292           L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
02293           L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
02294 #endif
02295 
02296           for (opC = opA->next_op; opC; opC = opC->next_op)
02297             {
02298               if (!PG_intersecting_predicates_ops (opB, opC))
02299                 continue;
02300               if (opC == opB)
02301                 continue;
02302               if ((L_general_branch_opcode (opC) ||
02303                    L_check_branch_opcode (opC)) &&
02304                   L_in_oper_OUT_set (cb, opC, opdW, TAKEN_PATH))
02305                 L_punt ("M_local_rev_copy_propagation: bad case encountered");
02306 
02307               for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
02308                 {
02309                   if (L_same_operand (opdW, opC->src[i]) &&
02310                       PG_subset_predicate_ops (opC, opB))
02311                     {
02312                       L_delete_operand (opC->src[i]);
02313                       opC->src[i] = L_copy_operand (opdZ);
02314                     }
02315                 }
02316 
02317               if (PG_superset_predicate_ops (opC, opB) &&
02318                   L_is_dest_operand (opdW, opC))
02319                 break;
02320             }
02321 
02322           for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
02323             {
02324               if (!L_same_operand (opA->dest[i], opdW))
02325                 continue;
02326               L_delete_operand (opA->dest[i]);
02327               opA->dest[i] = L_copy_operand (opdZ);
02328             }
02329 
02330           if (partial)
02331             {
02332               L_delete_operand (opA->pred[0]);
02333               opA->pred[0] = L_copy_operand (opB->pred[0]);
02334             }
02335 
02336           L_nullify_operation (opB);
02337 
02338           change++;
02339 #ifdef DEBUG_COPY_PROP2
02340           fprintf (stderr, "  becomes\n");
02341           L_print_oper (stderr, opA);
02342           L_print_oper (stderr, opB);
02343 #endif
02344           break;
02345         }
02346     }
02347   return change;
02348 }
02349 
02350 
02351 int
02352 M_local_constant_propagation (L_Cb * cb)
02353 {
02354   int i, old_num_oper, new_num_oper, change = 0;
02355   L_Oper *opA, *opB;
02356   L_Operand *old_src;
02357 
02358   for (opA = cb->first_op; opA; opA = opA->next_op)
02359     {
02360       /*
02361        *        match pattern
02362        */
02363       if (!L_move_opcode (opA) || !L_is_constant (opA->src[0]))
02364         continue;
02365 
02366       for (opB = opA->next_op; opB != NULL; opB = opB->next_op)
02367         {
02368           int macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag;
02369           /*
02370            *    match pattern
02371            */
02372           if (!L_move_opcode (opB) ||
02373               !L_is_src_operand (opA->dest[0], opB) ||
02374               !L_can_change_src_operand (opB, opA->dest[0]) ||
02375               !PG_superset_predicate_ops (opA, opB))
02376             continue;
02377 
02378           if (!L_no_defs_between (opA->dest[0], opA, opB))
02379             break;
02380 
02381           macro_flag = L_is_fragile_macro (opA->dest[0]);
02382           load_flag = 0;
02383           store_flag = 0;
02384 
02385           if (!L_no_danger (macro_flag, load_flag, store_flag, opA, opB))
02386             break;
02387 
02388           /*
02389            *    replace pattern.
02390            */
02391           for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
02392             {
02393               if (L_same_operand (opA->dest[0], opB->src[i]))
02394                 {
02395                   old_num_oper = M_num_oper_required_for (opB, L_fn->name);
02396                   old_src = opB->src[i];
02397                   opB->src[i] = L_copy_operand (opA->src[0]);
02398                   new_num_oper = M_num_oper_required_for (opB, L_fn->name);
02399 
02400                   /* if arch cannot handle opB after const prop, undo it */
02401 
02402                   if (new_num_oper > old_num_oper)
02403                     {
02404                       L_delete_operand (opB->src[i]);
02405                       opB->src[i] = old_src;
02406                       continue;
02407                     }
02408 
02409                   L_delete_operand (old_src);
02410 #ifdef TEST_CONST_PROP
02411                   fprintf (ERR, "const prop: op%d -> op%d, src %d (cb %d)\n",
02412                            opA->id, opB->id, i, cb->id);
02413 #endif
02414                   change++;
02415                 }
02416             }
02417 
02418           /* Make sure that cleanup fixes the proc_opc */
02419 
02420           opB->proc_opc = opA->proc_opc;
02421         }
02422     }
02423   return change;
02424 }
02425 
02426 
02427 void
02428 Mopti_debug (char *fmt, ...)
02429 {
02430   va_list args;
02431   time_t now;
02432   char timebuf[64];
02433 
02434   time (&now);
02435   strftime (timebuf, 64, "%Y%m%d %H:%M:%S", localtime (&now));
02436   fprintf (stderr, ">MoD %s> ", timebuf);
02437   va_start (args, fmt);
02438   vfprintf (stderr, fmt, args);
02439   va_end (args);
02440   fprintf (stderr, "\n");
02441   fflush (stderr);
02442   return;
02443 }
